include(ExternalProject)

set(LIBPRE ${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_PREFIX})
set(LIBSUF ${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX})
set(EP_SUPPORT_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ep-support)
set(EXTERNAL_CMAKE_ARGS
		-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}
		-DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=${CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM}
)
if(CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE)
	    get_filename_component(CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE_ABS "${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE}" ABSOLUTE)
		list(APPEND EXTERNAL_CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE:PATH=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE_ABS})
else()
	    list(APPEND EXTERNAL_CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER} -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER})
endif()

add_subdirectory(glfw)
